entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers or thunderstorms beginning early this evening. Risk of a severe thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
